products.title: PRODUCTS
products.desc: Acurella provides flexible solutions for online business, taking into account industry specifics and helping companies to adapt to the challenges of the modern business environment.

chart.title: Power of modern companies is in digitalization and the use of low-code technologies
chart.desc: We create intuitive IT solutions. Then we continuously improve them, responding to the challenges of time.

statistics.title: Acurella solutions are easily scaled
statistics.desc: Company’s developments support simultaneous operation of: dozens of administrative employees; thousands of branches; dozens of advertisers; thousands of operators. CPA solutions process hundreds of thousands of conversions per day, and CRM solutions process tens of thousands of orders.

functionsArray.text: CPA solution makes it easier to launch an offer and helps you to allocate your marketing budget
CRM monitors the progress of transactions, manages the sales process and generates up-to-date analytics
SCM automates the management of complex supply chains by controlling every step
API allows for three-way integration, creating a unique IT infrastructure for business
The system of aggregated reports helps TOP managers in making decisions and can even start business processes (for example, when the exchange rate changes)
Real-time data changes provide employees of all branches with up-to-date data

advantages.desc_1: Acurella solutions create an efficient ecosystem within the enterprise, automate processes and reduce dependence on manual factors.
advantages.desc_2: All sites and public subsystems are resistant to DDoS attacks, unauthorized access, cryptographic blocking attacks, etc.

information.text: Before we got acquainted with Acurella solutions, we thought that high-tech software makes it more difficult for a company with a huge number of processes. There are emergencies where an instant reaction of a person is necessary. However, in practice, it turned out that complex systems not only control every process to the smallest detail, minimizing the probability of force majeure, but also suggest optimal solutions that people do not always think of. This is the highest level!
information.name: Богдан Бровый

header.title: Cost Per Action Marketing (CPA)
header.desc: The network platform for affiliate marketing was created to help the advertiser and webmaster to cooperate mutually, and the owners of CPA networks to control the fulfillment of the terms of the transaction.

statistics.title: 360°CPA network monitoring: Security management
statistics.desc: The high-tech solution for CPA networks allows you to manage your partner network, advertising materials and relationships with affiliates in real time. By controlling each process to the smallest detail, the system automatically maintains the safety and high quality of services.

advantages: Accelerated process of creating, launching and testing of marketing campaigns for webmasters
Simplified control over the implementation of offers for advertisers (including anti-flood solutions)
Automated analysis of system performance indicators for network administrators

description.title_1: Designed for a large number of participants
description.desc_1: The platform supports simultaneous work of dozens of administrative employees, thousands of branches and dozens of advertisers.
description.desc_2: Thanks to the built-in profiling mechanisms, the system can automatically monitor the quality of traffic and monitor the work of webmasters.
description.title_form: Are you ready to experience all the features of the software for CPA networks?

functionsArray.text: Built-in features for partners, advertisers, administrators, and network owners
Tools for creating marketing campaigns with the possibility of A/B testing
Convenient process of offers creation through a system of fillable fields
Automatic verification of participants' work and notification system
Filtering, grouping, and granularity tools for data analysis
Convenient withdrawal of income after offer implementation

integration.title_main: Integration has never been so easy
integration.desc: With the help of API tools, the system can be integrated with Acurella software, as well as third-party software (for example, warehouse management system, logistics, etc.)
integration.title: Оптимизация нагрузки веб-мастеров
integration.subject: Инструменты контроля для топ-менеджеров
integration.text: Руководители компаний могут в любой момент зайти в систему и проверить качество работы маркетинга: просмотреть данные в виде преднастроенных дашбордов, проанализировать их через систему фильтров и сгруппировать в удобные отчеты.

list: Удобный вывод дохода после реализации оффера

Ability to create and

information.text: Thanks to the solution from Acurella, we were able to implement hundreds of offers in different parts of the world, receiving a regular stream of high quality and targeted leads. Acurella is a reliable and secure solution for those who do not have time for mistakes.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.desc: Answers to popular questions. Если вы не нашли ответ на ваш вопрос, вы можете задать его написав в службу поддержки

questionArray.ttl: Why do we need a CPA network?
questionArray.text: CPA network is a specialized marketing platform that aims to bring together different webmasters and advertisers for mutually beneficial cooperation.

questionArray.ttl: How do CPA network administrators earn money?
questionArray.text: The platform charges the advertiser a commission for its work, it helps with the offer technical integration, searches and connects webmasters, and performs mutual settlements with them. In addition, the platform is struggling with violations and monitors the quality of traffic.

questionArray.ttl: Who can use Acurella solutions?
questionArray.text: Network administrators, webmasters, advertisers and their managers have access to the platform through two-factor authentication.

questionArray.ttl: What does a web application consist of?
questionArray.text: A typical web application consists of one page adaptive external interface and an internal interface.

questionArray.ttl: How clear is the system?
questionArray.text: All user-facing parts of the system are performance-oriented. Each feature is intuitively understandable without special training.

questionArray.ttl: How secure is the platform?
questionArray.text: All sites and public subsystems are resistant to DDoS attacks, unauthorized access, cryptographic blocking attacks, etc. Data is transmitted over secure channels (HTTPS, TLS).

questionArray.ttl: Where is the data stored?
questionArray.text: Permanent data is stored in a data storage system, temporary data (such as caches) is stored in an in-memory data store.

questionArray.ttl: How stable is this storage system?
questionArray.text: The partner network's data storage is reliable and productive. In case of any damage, the main DBMS technology is PostgreSQL. In the event of the slightest damage to your data, a backup and recovery solution will immediately work.

questionArray.ttl: Can there be any problems with the access to the system?
questionArray.text: Platform sites and subsystems are available 24/7/365. We guarantee 99.95% uptime.

interruption.title:
Order Demo and check the capabilities of the software
for CPA networks

header.title: Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
header.desc: Acurella customer relationship management system monitors the flow of requests, recording any changes in orders and transmitting them to managers.

statistics.title: Full transaction cycle control
statistics.desc: CRM solution controls the entire order cycle: starting from the moment when the customer left the request, and ending with after-sales service. In this way, the Company minimizes the risk of error, automates routine processes, and ultimately exceeds customer expectations.

advantages: A single up-to-date database of orders with indication of their status for all offices of the Company
Automated customer communication scenarios for call center manager
Customizable reports with the ability to filter, group, and drill down for TOPs

description.desc_1: The platform significantly simplifies the interaction of call center, sales service, customer service and logistics service, helping to fulfill orders efficiently and on time.
description.desc_2: A large database of pre-configured reports helps you to monitor easily the work of team and implementation of sales plan, without wasting time filling in tables.
description.title_form: Are you ready to experience all the features of the software for call centers and sales departments?

functionsArray.text: Sales algorithm that runs based on customer responses
Analysis of conversation quality, order processing time, and performance indicators
Ability to select and configure the algorithms of distribution of orders between delivery services
Complete list of products based on their affiliation (main product, cross-selling product, etc.)
Ability to find an order in a few seconds: by ID, phone number, customer name and address
Detailed plan and fact of sales of team and individual manager in real time

integration.title_main: Integration has never been so easy
integration.desc: With the help of API tools, the system can be integrated with Acurella software, as well as third-party software (for example, warehouse management system, logistics, etc.)
integration.title: Optimization of call center managers work
integration.subject: Intelligent applications distribution
integration.text: The system manages the call servers so that the agent with the best sales target is the first to receive new calls. In addition, it regularly sends several calls to novice operators.

list: Complete list of orders (approved, rejected, in process)
Access to the results of your conversations quality evaluation

Revision of sales plan
execution statistics

logistics.title: Logistics automation
logistics.desc: Based on the repayment rate and cost of the service, the system automatically selects the optimal delivery service for each request.

functions_additional.title: Additional functions for logisticians
functions_additional.desc: CRM has built-in additional features for logisticians. You can set tasks for packers, send order information to the delivery service, monitor the status of shipment of orders, etc.

benefitArray.title: Увеличивает количество продаж и помогает выполнять план
benefitArray.text: By controlling the entire path of the client and helping to choose the optimal communication scenario, the system increases the conversion rate and the number of sales in general

benefitArray.title: Повышает обучаемость и продуктивность менеджеров
benefitArray.text: By automating routine tasks and maintaining the best scripts, CRM increases study skills and productivity of sales managers and call center employees

benefitArray.title: Контролирует своевременную доставку товара
benefitArray.text: Due to the built-in functionality for logisticians, CRM instantly transmits a signal about the order and tracks the delivery of goods

information.text: We chose CRM for Acurella when there was a need to expand the geography and enter new markets. Thanks to the fact that the system is completely autonomous, clear and automated, we were able to quickly establish the work of remote offices and did not overdue a single order.
information.name: Богдан Бровый

faq.title: FAQ
faq.desc: Answers to popular questions. Если вы не нашли ответ на ваш вопрос, вы можете задать его написав в службу поддержки

questionArray.ttl: What are CRM systems for?
questionArray.text: CRM systems are designed to control the full cycle of each transaction: starting from the formation of the application and ending with after-sales services.

questionArray.ttl: How do they simplify orders management?
questionArray.text: The platform stores all information about orders, saves status changes in real time, monitors the work of managers and delivery services, and generates reports itself. Transactions are executed faster, the dependence on the manual factor is reduced, and routine tasks are automated.

questionArray.ttl: Who can use Acurella solutions?
questionArray.text: Call center managers, quality managers, sales managers, internal logistics service managers, team leads, system administrators and top managers of the Company have access to the platform through two-factor authentication.

questionArray.ttl: What does the system consist of?
questionArray.text: The system is a set of web applications combined with background task processing servers powered by infrastructure (DBMS, memory storage, message bus, etc.).

questionArray.ttl: How clear is the system?
questionArray.text: All user-facing parts of the system are performance-oriented. Each feature is intuitively understandable without special training.

questionArray.ttl: How secure is the platform?
questionArray.text: All sites and public subsystems are resistant to DDoS attacks, unauthorized access, cryptographic blocking attacks, etc. Data is transmitted over secure channels (HTTPS, TLS).

questionArray.ttl: How long will the system remain up-to-date?
questionArray.text: The expected service life of the system is at least 10 years.

questionArray.ttl: How to track the effectiveness of your employees?
questionArray.text: The system already has built-in tools for analyzing key performance indicators using customizable dashboards.

questionArray.ttl: Can there be any problems with the access to the system?
questionArray.text: Platform sites and subsystems are available 24/7/365. We guarantee 99.95% uptime.

header.title: Supply Chain Management (SCM)
header.desc: Supply chain management system provides companies with state-of-the-art tools for tracking the entire production chain: from planning purchases of goods to sending orders.

statistics.title: All the necessary functions in one place
statistics.desc: The system collects, stores and processes data necessary for making correct management decisions and making forecasts. Now everything is under control: the system automatically keeps records of goods, controls delivery times, helps to choose the optimal volume of purchases, plan payments, make an action plan in case of force majeure and not only.

advantages: Convenient detailed accounting of planned and already implemented purchases for logisticians
Complete accounting of products, their statuses, specifications and other relevant information for commodity experts
The possibility of setting and monitoring tasks for a delivery for couriers and dispatchers

description.desc_1: The system allows you to create graphs, make predictions, and design the supply network to simulate different situations, etc.
description.desc_2: The next step is the timely launch, operational tracking and control of the implementation of logistics operations.
description.title_form: Are you ready to experience all the possibilities of logistics software?

functionsArray.text: All records of orders placed, product costs, and planned receipt dates
Editing information about stocks, orders and deliveries in real time
Limited access to individual functions for all roles involved in the business process
Built-in scheduling function of the schedule of payments on the basis of the procurement plans
Customizable reports with filtering, grouping, and drill-down tools
The ability to distribute the orders among couriers and monitor their implementation

integration.title_main: Integration has never been so easy
integration.desc: With the help of API tools, the system can be integrated with Acurella software, as well as third-party software (for example, warehouse management system, logistics, etc.)
integration.desc_1: The system helps to calculate the optimal stock for each position, taking into account the demand forecast and the insurance stock.
integration.desc_2: Users of the system can in a few clicks organize your products, set and create new properties in an interactive way.

information.text: Order management has never been easier. Acurella creates intuitive solutions that do not require special training and do not allow a beginner to get involved in business processes from the first working day.
information.name: Богдан Бровый

header.title: Accelerate your business prosperity with the help of modern IT-solutions

philosophy.desc_1: We guarantee business owners the high-quality services for software development, implementation and support 24/7. The high quality standards that apply to each product make them ultra-reliable, productive and intuitive for every user.
philosophy.desc_2: To provide customers with reliable and convenient solutions that will help simplify the work of the business, build up from competitors and reach new results. We strive to turn each client into a brand advocate and build an excellent reputation through practical cases from various business sectors.
philosophy.desc_3_1: Acurella solutions have been successfully implemented in thousands of companies around the world. In order to maintain an excellent reputation, we attract and retain developers who meet the highest standards of performance and ethics.
philosophy.desc_3_2: Acurella team continuously monitors IT trends and improves its skills, challenging itself all the time.

Each stage of the transaction is strictly controlled and recorded by the system: starting from customer acquisition (CPA), ending with order fulfillment (CRM) and fast delivery due to timely replenishment of stocks (SCM).

Цифровая трансформация: бонус или залог выживания?
Timely purchases in the right volume with the new solution from Acurella

new_2.title_main: Now CPA marketing is easier to manage: a new system from Acurella

content.text_1: Companies that sell a mass product to a wide audience are faced with the need to constantly attract new customers.
content.text_2: CPA networks, intermediaries between advertisers and webmasters, help to automate and optimize the process. At the same time, the first ones get high-quality traffic, and the second ones get a stipulated payment for their work.
content.text_3: Creating a system for marketing, Acurella aimed to simplify and secure the process of interaction between the parties as much as possible by digitalizing their work. CPA solution can be used by 4 parties at the same time:
content.item_1: Advertisers (to configure and manage offers, monitor the quality of the traffic, carry out the payment).
content.item_2: Webmasters (to find offers through a convenient filter system, launch and edit promo materials, conduct tests).
content.item_3: Network administrators (to monitor the transparency of interaction between advertisers and webmasters).
content.item_4: Company top managers (to monitor the performance of the team through aggregated reporting).
content.text_4: Thus, the CPA marketing solution helps advertisers and webmasters to exchange effectively the services, reducing the dependence on the manual factor.

new_3.title_main: Reference work of operators and managers at the expense of modern CRM

content.text_1: Every company that sells products online has to monitor a huge number of parallel processes on a daily basis.  Any transaction takes place with the involvement of marketers (traffic attraction), call center managers (communication with a client), production and warehouse workers (creation and packaging), as well as representatives of logistics service (delivery).
content.text_2: In order to avoid failures at one of the steps and create a positive experience for a client, companies resort to automating order management processes through a special software – CRM system.
content.text_3: CRM helps not only to minimize the risk of error, but also to reduce the dependence on the manual factor and increase the scale of production without the need to expand the staff.
content.text_4: In the process of creating its own CRM, Acurella sought to combine high system performance and an intuitive interface. CRM solution can be used simultaneously in 7 roles:
content.item_6: as a top manager of the company;
content.text_5: Thus, with Acurella CRM, you can not only automate the entire process of order management, but also track the result in a few clicks through the system of aggregated reports.

new_5.title_main: Timely purchases in the right volume with the new solution from Acurella

content.text_1: The ability to choose the optimal volume of the order batch is a prerequisite for improving the efficiency of the enterprise. If the batch is too large, it can be fraught with freezing of funds. In addition, if it is too small, administrative costs increase for repeated orders.
content.text_2: Supply chain management (SCM) software helps to integrate the management of raw materials, materials, products and services related to production and logistics. Thus, the customer always receives the ordered goods on time and in the right amount, and the company reduces costs significantly.
content.text_3: Representatives of different companies that are involved in the search for materials, the manufacturing process of products and their delivery can use the supply chain management system. At the same time, each of them will have limited access to the processes where it participates.
content.text_4: Acurella system can simplify at times the interaction:
content.text_5: Acurella software helps to automate the management of all stages of supply of the enterprise and control the movement of goods: the purchase of raw materials, production, and distribution of products.

header.title: 3-fold sales growth after digitalization
header.desc: How to achieve predictable results with the help of the digital ecosystem?

steps.desc_1: In order to meet the challenges of the market and to form an aggressive competitive position, Smart Media has reformed its business strategy in favor of digital transformation. With the help of Acurella solutions, the company sought to develop logistics and courier delivery. In fact, the built ecosystem helped not only to debug the delivery process of goods, but also to improve customer service, optimize marketing budgets and maintain the corporate atmosphere.
steps.desc_2: Smart Media is a diversified media holding company with a large division that sells products on the Internet and wants to develop its logistics and courier delivery.
steps.desc_3: CRM for order management. CPA to optimize marketing budgets. SCM for planning and controlling logistics processes.

indicators.title: Results
indicators.desc: In the course of its work, Acurella used the company's internal assets to create a new, unique market offer.
indicatorArray:
1 500+ of new
clients in CRM system
Increase from 10% to 30% of promotional materials effectiveness
Reduce by 80% of manual factor dependence
Increase by 1,5 times in average check and LTV of client
Increase by 3 times of the company's net profit

information.text: The best part is that now we can control every process. We have a powerful competitive advantage that fully meets the challenges of the time. The main thing is that the ecosystem is dynamic and can be easily adjusted. All Acurella systems are integrated with each other and can be integrated via API network with any third-party software
information.name: Vlad Matrosov
information.post: Head of Smart Media Sales Department

purpose.title: Goals
purpose.desc: Our main task was to help Smart Media to gain new competitive advantages and scale its own activities.
purpose.item_1: To create an intuitive digital ecosystem
purpose.item_2: To allow the users of systems to interact easily with each other
purpose.item_3: To use the functionality of the system to attract clients
purpose.item_4: To provide additional services for data storage and analysis
purpose.item_5: To combine the services of many external companies to quickly track order statuses
purpose.item_6: To set up a dynamic request management process to improve communication with customers
purpose.item_7: To open the possibility for new three-way integrations via API network
purpose.item_8: To set up aggregated reporting for top managers
purpose.item_10: To ensure data protection through encryption systems

statistics.title: Solution
statistics.desc: Cyclical ecosystem for the C. O. D model helped to take control of the entire transaction cycle and achieve maximum efficiency at each stage.

vacancies.desc_1: The team of ideologists who strive to simplify and optimize the work of online companies through reliable, secure and high-tech software. We are united by a love of technology and a desire to realize the potential in bold solutions that will be used in thousands of companies around the world.
vacancies.desc_2: Ambitious and talented professionals who are not afraid to challenge themselves and defend the interests of our clients. We are looking for our people in all corners of the globe and are ready to support their desire to develop and implement promising ideas in life.

team.title: Our team
team.text_1: Acurella is a multinational group of ambitious specialists with deep expertise in the field of high technologies. Each of our projects with clients is an important strategic task, which involves the entire team.
team.text_2: Project management is carried out using the SCRUM methodology and is divided into two-week scripts. At the same time, each stage of software implementation is controlled by both Acurella top management and top management of customer company.

For us the customer's safety is a top priority

block_1: With the growth of our client, we’re looking an experienced UI/UX Designer with great skills and a great portfolio to showcase. Your main focus will be to conduct a full design cycle, from collecting inspiration through creating a flawless UI for all states and scenarios, and deliver to development. In Acurella we take care of our employees — we create comfortable working conditions. We feel the contact with our person, so we have only 2 stages of the interview and. For the period of quarantine, it is possible to work both in the office (24/7) and remotely (Cyprus, Nicosia).
block_2: 3+ years of experience in UX and interactive design
Mastery over design tools like PhotoShop, Sketch, and Illustrator
Familiarity with animation and prototyping tools, such as Invision, Principle, and Axure
Passion for solving complex product problems
Strong communication skills and ability to work in a team
block_3: collaborate with Product Managers and Software Developers and define, design and deliver pixel-perfect products
conduct extensive product research based on user feedback, data, competitor analysis and more
analyze data and conduct usability sessions with real users after product launches
map all possible scenarios and create product flows
take charge of functional design and create wireframes, from rough sketches to complete and animated prototypes

block_2: Knowledge of Flux architecture, experience with Redux
